sentences.en: Among the ignoramus, his loss has how much!
sentences.cn: 在不知不觉当中, 他的损失有多少!

sentences.en: Even a top ignoramus would not believe what you said.
sentences.cn: 即使是再无知的人也不会相信你的话.

sentences.en: I've never met ignoramus like Lao Zhang, He can't even separate the sheep from the goat.
sentences.cn: 我还从来没见过像老张那样无知的人.他竟然连好坏都分不清.

sentences.en: That guy is more than stupid. He's a dyed - in - the - wool ignoramus.
sentences.cn: 那家伙岂止愚蠢,他简直是彻底无知.

sentences.en: This ignoramus failed to salute me.
sentences.cn: 这个蠢汉看见我不行礼.

sentences.en: Walter : And he was a complete ignoramus as far as the internet was concerned.
sentences.cn: 华尔特: 讲到网际网路,他更是完全不懂.

sentences.en: When it comes to music, I'm a complete ignoramus.
sentences.cn: 说到音乐，我完全是个门外汉。

sentences.en: You ignoramus, but music is reflection of self.
sentences.cn: 你们这些蠢蛋, 音乐只是自我心灵的反射.

words.tran_cn: 不学无术的人；无知的人

trans.tran_en: someone who does not know about things that most people know about
